import cv2
import numpy as np
img = cv2.imread('img/dcz.jpg')
key = np.random.randint(0,256,img.shape,dtype=np.uint8)
secret = cv2.bitwise_xor(img,key)
cv2.imshow('img',img)
cv2.imshow('secret',secret)
cv2.imwrite('secret.png',secret)
cv2.imwrite('key.png',key)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
dcz=cv2.imread("img/dcz.jpg")
r,c,h=dcz.shape
mask=np.zeros((r,c,h),dtype=np.uint8)
mask[90:630,180:730]=255
key=np.random.randint(0,256,size=dcz.shape,dtype=np.uint8)
dczXorKey=cv2.bitwise_xor(dcz,key)  
encryptFace=cv2.bitwise_and(dczXorKey,mask)
cv2.imshow("dczXorKey",dczXorKey)
cv2.imshow("encryptFace",encryptFace)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
dcz=cv2.imread("img/dcz.jpg")
r,c,h=dcz.shape
mask=np.zeros((r,c,h),dtype=np.uint8)
mask[90:630,180:730]=255
key=np.random.randint(0,256,size=dcz.shape,dtype=np.uint8)
dczXorKey=cv2.bitwise_xor(dcz,key)
encryptFace=cv2.bitwise_and(dczXorKey,mask)
noFace1=cv2.bitwise_and(dcz,255-mask)
maskFace=encryptFace+noFace1
cv2.imshow("noFace1",noFace1)
cv2.imshow("maskFace",maskFace)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
img = cv2.imread('dcz.jpg')#读取图像
key = np.random.randint(0,256,img.shape,dtype=np.uint8)#生成密钥图像
secret = cv2.bitwise_xor(img,key)#加密
cv2.imshow('img',img)#显示图像
cv2.imshow('secret',secret)
cv2.imwrite('secret.png',secret)#对加密图像进行保存
cv2.imwrite('key.png',key)#对密钥进行保存
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
dcz=cv2.imread("dcz.jpg")
r,c,h=dcz.shape
mask=np.zeros((r,c,h),dtype=np.uint8)
#获取面部区域位置信息，并将其设置为白色
mask[90:630,180:730]=255
cv2.imshow("dcz",dcz)
cv2.imshow("mask",mask)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()
key=np.random.randint(0,256,size=dcz.shape,dtype=np.uint8)  # 获取密钥
dczXorKey=cv2.bitwise_xor(dcz,key)  # 对原始图像进行加密
encryptFace=cv2.bitwise_and(dczXorKey,mask) # 获取加密图像的脸部信息
cv2.imshow("dczXorKey",dczXorKey)
cv2.imshow("encryptFace",encryptFace)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()
noFace1=cv2.bitwise_and(dcz,255-mask)     # 将原始图像的面部区域置0
maskFace=encryptFace+noFace1                # 获取加密的原始图像
cv2.imshow("noFace1",noFace1)
cv2.imshow("maskFace",maskFace)
cv2.waitKey(0)
cv2.destroyAllWindows()

import cv2
import numpy as np
import os
if not os.path.exists("img"):
    os.makedirs("img")
def decode_face(original_image_path, encrypted_image_path, key_image_path, mask_image_path, output_image_path,
                face_coords):
    original_image = cv2.imread(original_image_path)
    encrypted_image = cv2.imread(encrypted_image_path)
    key_image = cv2.imread(key_image_path)
    mask_image = cv2.imread(mask_image_path)
    if original_image is None or encrypted_image is None or key_image is None or mask_image is None:
        print("无法加载图像，请确保路径正确！")
        return
    h, w = encrypted_image.shape[:2]
    x, y, w_face, h_face = face_coords
    if key_image.shape[:2] != (h_face, w_face) or mask_image.shape[:2] != (h_face, w_face):
        print("密钥图像或掩膜图像的尺寸与面部区域不匹配！")
        return
    decoded_face = cv2.bitwise_xor(encrypted_image[y:y + h_face, x:x + w_face], key_image)
    original_image[y:y + h_face, x:x + w_face] = cv2.bitwise_and(decoded_face, mask_image)
    cv2.imwrite(output_image_path, original_image)
if __name__ == "__main__":
    original_image_path = "img/dcz.jpg"
    encrypted_image_path = "img/dcz_secret.png"
    key_image_path = "img/key.png"
    mask_image_path = "img/mask.png"
    output_image_path = "img/dcz_decoded.png"
    face_coords = [90, 180, 630 - 90, 730 - 180]  # 注意坐标是左上角和右下角
    decode_face(original_image_path, encrypted_image_path, key_image_path, mask_image_path, output_image_path,
                face_coords)
    print("解码后的图像已成功保存到img文件夹中！")

text:
对img文件夹中的“dcz.jpg”图像生成密钥图像，并将其保存到img文件夹中，命名为“key.png”。然后，使用密钥图像使用异或操作对“dcz.jpg”进行加密，生成的加密图像保存到img文件夹内，命名为“secret.png”。
提交完整代码。
